pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā ārāmaṁ āgacchanti dhammassavanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.3: Dhamme bhāsite therā bhikkhū yathāvihāraṁ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.4: Navakā bhikkhū tattheva upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ upāsakehi saddhiṁ muṭṭhassatī, asampajānā, naggā, vikūjamānā, kākacchamānā seyyaṁ kappenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā naggā vikūjamānā kākacchamānā seyyaṁ kappessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.7: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ upāsakānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.8: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū te navake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.11: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.14: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.17.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:1.18: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.2: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena kosambī tadavasari. Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati badarikārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.4: “bhagavatā, āvuso rāhula, sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ—‘na anupasampannena sahaseyyā kappetabbā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.6: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo seyyaṁ alabhamāno vaccakuṭiyā seyyaṁ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.7: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena vaccakuṭi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ukkāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.12: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.15: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:2.16.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.1.14: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye, anupasampanne nipanne, bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.1.15: Bhikkhu nipanne, anupasampanno nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.1: Anupasampanne anupasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.2: Anupasampanne vematiko uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.2.3: Anupasampanne upasampannasaññī uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc5:3.3.4: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
